Package it.seba.juno.controller

Class MenuController

java.lang.Object
it.seba.juno.controller.MenuController
public class MenuController extends Object
Controls the MenuView of the program and assign actions to the MenuView components.
Author:
Sebastian Rapetti

  • Constructor Details

    • MenuController

      public MenuController(GameModel gameModel, MainView mainView, MenuView menuView, OptionsView optionsView, PlayersView playersView, GameView gameView)
      Class Constructor.
      Parameters:
      gameModel - The game model, used to reset the game view if there is any change in options
      mainView - The main view, used to host all others view.
      menuView - The menu view, show the main menu.
      optionsView - The options view, show the application options
      playersView - The players view, manage players
      gameView - The game view, manage the game table and the match between players
